unnormalised: Social Media & Influencer Marketing: What's Trending Today?
normalised: Social Media and Influencer Marketing: What's Trending Today?

unnormalised: Namaste, internet friends! Ever scrolled through your Insta feed and wondered why *that* random video of aunty singing a Mukesh song at a Delhi wedding went viral? That's the magic of virality trends, folks!
normalised: Namaste, internet friends! Ever scrolled through your Insta feed and wondered why that random video of aunty singing a Mukesh song at a Delhi wedding went viral? That's the magic of virality trends, folks!

unnormalised: This week, it's all about "Desi Remixes," think Bollywood classics with a Gen-Z twist. Remember "Pathaan"? Well, expect that music to soundtrack everything from food vlogs to travel reels showing trips from Mumbai to Kashmir.
normalised: This week, it's all about "Desi Remixes," think Bollywood classics with a Gen-Z twist. Remember "Pathaan"? Well, expect that music to soundtrack everything from food vlogs to travel reels showing trips from Mumbai to Kashmir.

unnormalised: Experts at IIM Ahmedabad are studying how nostalgia, coupled with short-form video formats, is driving these trends. They're saying authenticity is key. No one wants a forced meme; it's gotta feel organic, like that delicious jalebi you grabbed from Chandni Chowk.
normalised: Experts at I I M Ahmedabad are studying how nostalgia, coupled with short-form video formats, is driving these trends. They're saying authenticity is key. No one wants a forced meme; it's gotta feel organic, like that delicious jalebi you grabbed from Chandni Chowk.

unnormalised: Plus, influencers are jumping on the bandwagon, creating content around hyperlocal trends. So keep an eye out, your next viral moment could be just a chai break away! And remember, originality wins!
normalised: Plus, influencers are jumping on the bandwagon, creating content around hyperlocal trends. So keep an eye out, your next viral moment could be just a chai break away! And remember, originality wins!
